turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to place a coffee order for pickup at Starbucks, please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. Which Starbucks location?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one in Victorville, California on Bear Valley Road, please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. What would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a vente white chocolate mocha, iced with whipped cream, please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I'd also like a grande mocha chip frappuccino with no whipped cream, please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. No problem. got it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to pick those up at 6pm tonight.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'll make sure your order is ready at that time.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Let me repeat your order. That's one vente white chocolate mocha, iced with whipped cream and one grande mocha chip frappuccino with no whipped cream. Is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's correct

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Perfect. Would you like to put that on the card that you have on file?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright. Let me confirm. Your order will be 11.25 and will be ready for pickup tonight at 6pm

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's great

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else that I can help you with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, but thanks so much for your help

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you and enjoy your coffee
